Field Detail

ADD_PREFIX

private static final java.lang.Boolean ADD_PREFIX
When using CAS attributes for GrantedAuthorities, you need to append the 'ROLE_' prefix for Spring Security

NON_EXISTENT_PASSWORD_VALUE

private static final java.lang.String NON_EXISTENT_PASSWORD_VALUE
When using cas, the password attribute of the User object means nothing.

NO_ROLES

private static final java.util.List NO_ROLES
Some Spring Security classes (e.g. RoleHierarchyVoter) expect at least one role, so we give a user with no granted roles this one which gets past that restriction but doesn't grant anything.

private static final java.lang.String PREFIX
